df = get_data()
ef = EfficientFrontier(*setup_efficient_frontier(data_only=True),
    weight_bounds=(-1, 1))
ef.cov_matrix = risk_models.semicovariance(df, benchmark=0)
w = ef.max_sharpe()
assert isinstance(w, dict)
assert set(w.keys()) == set(ef.tickers)
np.testing.assert_almost_equal(ef.weights.sum(), 1)
np.testing.assert_allclose(ef.portfolio_performance(), (0.3564305116656491,
    0.07201282488003401, 4.671813836300796))
